biography.summary: Andrey is a full-stack developer specialising in React and Next.js.
biography.body: Over the years Andrey has created numerous websites and web applications for clients in various industries.

articles.title: Corporate site CSTBI
articles.description: Multi-page corporate website for a construction company.
articles.label: portfolio

content.section1: Tech stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.

quote: Great collaboration leads to great results

content.section2: The website presents services and allows visitors to get in touch via forms.

articles.title: Landing for Begov Club
articles.description: Site for a running club with schedule and membership form.
articles.label: portfolio

content.section1: Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

content.section2: Implemented membership registration and events schedule.
